ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
I’ve been waiting for you! We’re gonna
have a blast, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2101_02_10: Use it all in one go when it’ll help the most!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I have something I’ve been wanting to give
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
The moment I found it, I saw your face—
like, BAM! So I figured I’d hold on to it
for you!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
This is the best present I could think of for
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Hope you
like it!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I always have tons of fun when I’m with
you—both in and out of battle—so this is
my way of saying thanks!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Hey! What do you wanna talk about?
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
There’s so much I wanna talk about, I’m not
sure where to start!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Awesome! I’ve been wanting to chat with
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Wow, this is really nice! Are you sure I can
have it?
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll for
sure find a way to thank you for this!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was fun! See you around!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2401_01_10: I had so much fun chatting, the time flew by!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
We couldn’t help but keep chatting, huh?
I guess we’re super compatible!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8001_0701_01_10: Seems you can run into a lot of people here.
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Back in Unova, if you make eye contact with
another Trainer, you gotta battle!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
But...wouldn’t it be nice if you had a chat
instead?
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Sometimes, when I notice something off
about people or Pokémon around me,
I get a serious look on my face...
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8002_0701_02_10: But that doesn’t mean I’m angry, OK?!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
That’s just what my face does when I’m
thinking hard!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
I like sweets almost as much as Pokémon
battles!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
Nemona tells me Paldea has a food stand
called Kanto Crepes!
ch0004_00_toko_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
One day, I wanna try all the different
sweets from around the world!
